Job Posting:169430 - Position: F25 Co-op/Intern Developer, Back End Technologies 169430 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 05/20/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/08/2025 11:26 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Kinaxis 700 Silver Seven Road Ottawa K2V 1C3 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description Location 2025 - Fall F25 Co-op/Intern Developer, Back End Technologies 169430 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 8 or 12 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List This is a hybrid position. You must be in the Ottawa, Canada office, at least three days a week. About the team Kinaxis is looking for a talented candidate to work within our Data Server team. This team is responsible for developing and maintaining the unique versioned database that sits at the base of our technology stack. The buck stops with us for customer issues; every single one of Kinaxis's worldwide customers depends on the Data Server operating correctly and performantly. If you're ready to take on that responsibility, and want to face unique challenges you won't see with other teams, we might just be for you. This is a full-time, 8, or 12-month position, starting September 2025 To be eligible for a Co-op or Intern position at Kinaxis, you must either be currently enrolled in full-time education or, if you are a recent/upcoming graduate, your graduation date must be within 12 months of the placement end date. What you will do • Balance complexity, execution time, and memory footprint to deliver performant solutions? • Design algorithms and data structures that minimize memory footprint and perform efficiently? • Enable scalable and performant operations of our multi-threaded query engine • Harness the power of our automated test infrastructure and the creative energy of our testers to ensure your code keeps working correctly, with high performance? • Advance your knowledge and application of?modern C++ to?optimize the code to achieve the above goals? • Collaborate closely with your Agile team members and other stakeholders Perform additional projects as needed • Job Requirements What we are looking for • Recent grad or have finished at least 3 years of studies in a Computer Science or Software Engineering (or equivalent) program • Non-academic C++ programming experience, including development with multi-threading • • Strong technical skills Insatiable drive for improving performance • Good collaborative skills and positive attitude • A creative thinker that is good at problem solving Things that would definitely help Previous co-op work terms or internships • We're accepting applications now through end of day on Tuesday, May 20, 2025. Please note that we may begin reviewing applications before the posting closes, so early submission is encouraged. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Co-op/Intern Developer, Back End Technologies in Ottawa, Ontario | Careers at Ottawa Headquarters Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
